welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spitalfields, the vibrant heart of East London! Known for its charming blend of history and modernity, we invite you to immerse yourself in this lively neighborhood and discover all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers luxury services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Heathrow's newest terminal, featuring modern architecture and a wide range of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow, serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Home to many SkyTeam airlines, this terminal offers a variety of duty-free shopping and dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, exclusively used by British Airways and Iberia airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a modern and spacious terminal that serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 90 minutes by registering with their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.
